price: 54. [Ibrahimas (Abraomas)] tarė: „Ar jūs man perduodate geras žinias (apie sūnų), kai mane užklupo senas amžius? Apie ką tada yra jūsų naujienos?“
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla abashartumūnī ʿalā an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashirūna
translations: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings
